rules: Always confirm pickup location, destination, and time before booking
Calculate and show estimated fare when possible
Ask for number of passengers to recommend appropriate vehicle
Mention if pickup is outside service area

book_ride.response: Collect: pickup location, destination, date/time, passengers, vehicle preference

get_quote.response: Ask for pickup and destination to calculate fare

check_availability.response: Check if location is within service area

handoffConditions: Request is outside standard booking (special requirements)
Customer wants to cancel or modify existing booking
